link.title: ASD Technology for Families
link.script:

");}).call(this);

h2.a: Continuous learning activities during school closure

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.h2: Family Tech Focus - Spring 2020: At-Home Resources
div.p: ASD students may continue accessing learning resources at home. During school closures, the following resources may assist:

h3.a: How to Access Electronic Educational Resources from Home
Logging into ASD Online Resources (for Families)
Logging into KCLS Library Online Resources

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.h3: If you require technical assistance, please contact your school's Technology Specialist
